/** built in procs */
WriteString 0x5000 [address: 00000000000000000101000000000000]
GetInt 0x6000 [address: 00000000000000000110000000000000]
WriteNewline 0x7000 [address: 00000000000000000111000000000000]
WriteInt 0x8000	[address: 00000000000000000001111101000000]
/** end built in procs */


/** .data */
sum DWORD ?
0x1000 [address: 00000000000000000001000000000000]

average DWORD ?
0x2000 [address: 00000000000000000010000000000000]

prompt BYTE "Enter a non-negative integer: ",0
0x3000 [address: 00000000000000000011000000000000]

message BYTE "Average= ",0
0x4000 [address: 00000000000000000100000000000000]
/** end .data */


/** .run */
move 0, GP4
001000 100 00000000000000000000000000000000 000 0011

move [prompt], AR1
001000 011 00000000000000000011000000000000 000 0100

call WriteString
001010 00000000000000000101000000000000

call GetInt
001010 00000000000000000110000000000000

add sum, RV1
000000 001 00000000000000000001000000000000 000 1000

call WriteNewline
001010 00000000000000000111000000000000

add GP4,1
000000 000 0011 100 00000001

compare_lt GP4, 9
010000 000 0011 100 000001001

branch top_loop
010101 11111111111111111111111111111001

divide2 sum, 10, average
000111 001 00000000000000000001000000000000 100 00001010 001 00000000000000000010000000000000

move [message], AR1
001000 011 00000000000000000100000000000000 000 0100

call WriteString
001010 00000000000000000101000000000000

move [average], AR1
001000 011 00000000000000000010000000000000 000 0100

call WriteInt
001010 00000000000000000001111101000000

call WriteNewline
001010 00000000000000000111000000000000
/** end .run */
